# Virtual environment directories
.venv/
env/
myenv/

# Python bytecode
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Python virtual environment
*.env
*.venv

# Environment variables file
.env

# CSV files (if they contain sensitive data)
*.csv

# Log files
*.log

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.swp
*.swo

# Packages
*.egg
*.egg-info/
dist/
build/
eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
wheels/
share/python-wheels/

# Compiled C extensions
*.so

# macOS system files
.DS_Store

# Image files (optional)
*.png

# Ignore files generated by IDEs
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# Node modules (if any)
node_modules/
# Node modules (if any)
node_modules/
 myenv/
*.csv
.ipynb_checkpoints/
__pycache__/
*.pyc
